casebody.data:
HAYES
v.
ALLSTATE INS. CO., et al. No. 579P07. Supreme Court of North Carolina. October 9, 2008.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 5th day of December 2007 by Plaintiff for "Petition for Discretionary Review":

"Motion Denied by order of the Court in conference this the 9th day of October 2008."
